result.eng: They went on a visit to Rome.

result.eng: I'm from Rome but I live in Dublin now.

result.ponchtml: Is as an Róiṁ mé aċ tá mé i mo ċónaí i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ anoisI'm from Rome but I live in Dublin now.

result.eng: Rome is lovely. I was there last year.
